channel.title: CVE Feed for Universal Robots -- Universal Robots Robot Controller version CB 3.1, SW Version 3.4.5-100
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Universal Robots -- Universal Robots Robot Controller version CB 3.1, SW Version 3.4.5-100

item.title: CVE-2018-10633|2024-09-17T01:00:45.449Z -- universal%20robots -- universal%20robots%20robot%20controller%20version%20cb%203.1%2C%20sw%20version%203.4.5-100
item.description: Universal Robots Robot Controllers Version CB 3.1, SW Version 3.4.5-100 utilizes hard-coded credentials that may allow an attacker to reset passwords for the controller.
